main_definition: To the utmost or full extent; totally.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Without any exceptions or qualifications; absolutely.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: ללא כל חריגים או כישורים; בהחלט.
meanings_and_examples.example: I completely agree with your assessment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To a total degree; fully and entirely.
meanings_and_examples.example: He was completely exhausted after running the marathon.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: הוא היה מותש לחלוטין לאחר ריצת המרתון.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Without any remainder or leftovers; entirely finished.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: ללא כל שאריות או שאריות; גמור לחלוטין.
meanings_and_examples.example: The cake is completely eaten, there's none left.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a thorough manner that leaves no part untouched.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: בצורה יסודית שלא משאירה שום חלק על כנו.
meanings_and_examples.example: She cleaned the room completely, not leaving any dust behind.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: היא ניקתה את החדר לגמרי, לא השאירה אחריה אבק.
